title: MBeansHandlerTest.testDiff regularly fails
description:
org.apache.solr.handler.admin.MBeansHandlerTest.testDiff regularly fails, both for me locally and on the Jenkins instances that email the dev mailing list e.g. https://builds.apache.org/job/Lucene-Solr-Tests-6.x/708/testReport/junit/org.apache.solr.handler.admin/MBeansHandlerTest/testDiff/

This appears to be an issue with the test itself, patch to follow.

comments.content: Same as SOLR-10090? Not sure what's holding the fix there
comments.author: Tomás Fernández Löbbe
